sn7.16:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena paccanīkasāto nāma brāhmaṇo sāvatthiyaṃ paṭivasati.
sn7.16:4.5: Yaṃ yadeva samaṇo gotamo bhāsissati taṃ tadevassāhaṃ paccanīkāssan”ti.
sn7.16:4.6: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā abbhokāse caṅkamati.
sn7.16:4.7: Atha kho paccanīkasāto brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn7.16:6.4: sa ve jaññā subhāsitan”ti.
sn7.16:7.1: Evaṃ vutte, paccanīkasāto brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.16:7.2: “abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama … pe …
sn7.16:7.3: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
